twoSetSkill.name: Best Drummer 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Extends the duration of Elated Mode provided by this stigmata set by another 2s. Each attack buffs the effects by another 1%. After entering Elated Mode, gain 50% Physical DMG for the next Combo ATK and a short duration afterwards.

threeSetSkill.name: Bass 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Attacks against Frozen enemies gain 20% Physical DMG. Kiana or Kallen equip bonus: Combo ATKs gain 20% Total DMG Multiplier.
